data.title: Add a selection decoration for stances
data.body:
Units with an assigned stance should get an icon in the bottom-left corner of their selection box, and we should drop the horrible Debug: text when switching stance.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/415089-add-a-selection-decoration-for-stances?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Improve SpriteFont
data.body:
There's a few areas that can be improved:
- [ ] Don't leak texture space when switching map / mod.
- [x] Can use FT_Load_Char instead of FT_Get_Char_Index / FT_Load_Glyph.
- [ ] Support kerning (FT_Get_Kerning) - does Freesans include hinting metadata?
- [ ] Do colors on the GPU via a vertex attribute.
- [ ] Support bold / italic / underline / strikethrough as a formatting bit-field..

The last two points will be needed before we can support inline formatting for strings.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/415091-improve-spritefont?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: fix sniper hotkey conflict AGAIN
data.body: You can't use `s`, it's a combat hotkey.

data.title: Convert projectiles to world coordinates
data.body:
Both armaments and rendering now use world coordinates. Having to convert to PPos and back for the projectile code makes @pchote sad.

This will also allow us to fix several bugs and warts relating to inconsistent 2d/3d calculations for damage and range (e.g. #3347).

data.title: Convert target / range checks to world coordinates
data.body:
Start by introducing `IEnumerable<WPos> Positions` on Target then replace Combat.IsInRange and friends.

This should fix any remaining issues like #2417, #2205 and target locations switching to (0,0) when the referenced actor is killed. It is also desirable for TS/RA2 support.

data.title: Remove Buildable.BuildAt
Let the cruisers jump in again on the temperat shellmap
data.body: fixes #3126

data.title: corflags OpenRA.Utility.exe /32BITREQ+
data.body: fixes #2812

data.title: Don't crash when the player to drop can't be found.
data.body: fixes #3224 although I can't reproduce the problem.

data.title: Remove some maps
Add RALint pass for checking hotkey conflicts
Ra perf removal
data.body: These test cases aren't particularly interesting, and the bug IDs they referred to are no longer accessible.

data.title: Added wuschel to contributors
data.body: Added wuschel to contributors.

data.title: Updating 7 large scale wuschel maps
data.body:
-- updated: RA map POSEIDON - facelift, small tactical changes on middle island.
-- updated: RA map PLUTO - corrected oil derrick that was not capturable.
-- updated: RA map ARTEMIS - some cosmetic changes on main island.
-- updated: RA map ARES - minor yaml changes to MISS.
-- updated: RA map APOLLO - minor yaml changes to MISS.
-- updated: RA map DIONYSUS - cosmetic changes on main island, minor yaml changes to MISS.
-- added: RA map ZEUS, 256x320 (lo and behold, the father of all mapz!)

Note: ZEUS, ARTEMIS and APOLLO need https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/3375 to be implemented in order to avoid lags. The first map (Zeus) is lagging badly, Artemis is faring better, and Apollo is usually slowing down end-game.

data.title: Added Imperial Basin
data.body: also cleaned up the Dune 2000 map folder for more variety.

data.title: Remove DeadBuildingState
data.body: Replace it with building husks.

data.title: Remove run-time mod merging
data.body:
we agreed that it is a mess and mostly unused.

Requires:
- [x] putting the maps from the ra_perf mod elsewhere #3426
- [x] remove the example mod (partly broken because passengers conflict with money delivery trait)
- [x] updating the wiki

data.title: Display the current sound engine in the console
data.body: as we do for renderer.

data.title: Added a small error message popup and link to the FAQ
data.body: After answering lot's of "the game just closes immediately upon startup" on IRC/ModDB/Forums I decided it is time for some more user-friendliness.

data.title: Don't reserve airfields/helipads for husks that just fall down
data.body: in the first place. Fixes #3376

data.title: Kill/Death counts are bogus when husks are involved
Added RA map Zeus (giant size)
data.body: This map requires the improvement of A\* pathfinding https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/3375 to be implemented. Added this 256x320 size naval/land warfare map before it rots away on my drive. Note that old mine layer and oil derrick yaml modification has been removed.

data.title: Remove Bitrotted JoinExternalGame.
data.body: Fixes #3406. Closes #2153.

data.title: Added native support for Dune 2000 SOUND.RS packages
data.body:
They contain WAV files #3383. I read documentation about
- [SOUND.RS](http://d2kplus.com/wiki/index.php?title=SOUND.RS)
- [WAVE fact-chunk](http://www.it.hs-esslingen.de/~schmidt/vorlesungen/mm/seminar/ss00/HTML/node118.html)

and took a look at @mvi's [SoundRSEditor](https://code.google.com/p/dune2000plusone/source/browse/trunk/Dune2k1/SoundRSEditor/SoundRSEditor/Form1.cs#52) source code.

This shrinks our installer package again and it seems the explosion sound nicer without the WAV  AUD conversion I did manually months ago.

data.title: Add "Change Mod" buttons to RA and D2K. Fixes #3401.
interim fix for turreted units moving in too close to target
data.body:
Sets RangeTolerance to 0 as an interim solution.
Increases weapon range of jeep and all 4 tanks with cannons in RA mod by 1 cell.

This reduces the annoying behavior of turreted units moving close to their target, exposing themselves to friendly fire and reducing their effective attack range. (issue #2104)

I'm aware this might make it more difficult to attack fleeing targets, but that is already the case for none-turreted units anyway. I didn't notice much of a problem during testing, but more testing from others may be needed to verify this.

If disabling the RangeTolerance is considered too problematic, maybe settle for only increasing the weapon range of the turreted units for now as a little band aid.

data.title: Made ore mines indestructible
data.body: This was a game-breaking problem because it can cause no cash stale mates and that is boring. I consider this a regression/bug, but in fact the community discussed whether this is a feature which provides valid tactics or can be exploited too easily http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=16286 and our wise crowd decided for invulnerable ore mines.

data.title: Captured hospitals should gradually heal all of your infantry on the map
data.body: as in Generals. This makes them actually worth capturing.

data.title: Paradrop should allow for dropping multiple infantry units into the same cell
data.body:
using subcells, as in RA95.

data.title: interim fix to issue #2205 (problem with weapon range from some angles)
data.body:
revision 2, factoring in pchote's suggestion.
fixes the problem that from certain angles one actor could shoot the other but not vice-versa despite identical weapon range.

replaces #3392.
